# Tackling Business Complexity in a Microservice with DDD and CQRS Patterns

> Documentation for Tackling Business Complexity in a Microservice with DDD and CQRS Patterns.

- [Applying simplified CQRS and DDD patterns in a microservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/apply-simplified-microservice-cqrs-ddd-patterns.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand the overall relation between CQRS and DDD patterns.
- [Client-side validation (validation in the presentation layers)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/client-side-validation.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Explore the key concepts of client-side validation.
- [Implementing reads/queries in a CQRS microservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/cqrs-microservice-reads.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand the implementation of the queries side of CQRS on the ordering microservice in eShopOnContainers using Dapper.
- [Designing a DDD-oriented microservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/ddd-oriented-microservice.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand the design of the DDD-oriented ordering microservice and its application layers.
- [Domain events: Design and implementation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/domain-events-design-implementation.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Get an in-depth view of domain events, a key concept to establish communication between aggregates.
- [Designing validations in the domain model layer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/domain-model-layer-validations.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand key concepts of domain model validations.
- [Using Enumeration classes instead of enum types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/enumeration-classes-over-enum-types.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Lear how you can use enumeration classes, instead of enums, as a way to solve some limitations of the latter.
- [Applying CQRS and CQS approaches in a DDD microservice in eShopOnContainers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/eshoponcontainers-cqrs-ddd-microservice.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand the way CQRS is implemented in the ordering microservice in eShopOnContainers.
- [Implementing value objects](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/implement-value-objects.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Get into the details and options to implement value objects using new Entity Framework features.
- [Tackling Business Complexity in a Microservice with DDD and CQRS Patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/index.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand how to tackle complex business scenarios applying DDD and CQRS Patterns
- [Designing the infrastructure persistence layer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/infrastructure-persistence-layer-design.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Explore the repository pattern in the design of the infrastructure persistence layer.
- [Implementing the infrastructure persistence layer with Entity Framework Core](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/infrastructure-persistence-layer-implementation-entity-framework-core.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Explore the implementation details for the infrastructure persistence layer, using Entity Framework Core.
- [Implementing the microservice application layer using the Web API](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/microservice-application-layer-implementation-web-api.md): Understand the Dependency Injection and the Mediator patterns and their implementation details in the Web API application layer.
- [Designing the microservice application layer and Web API](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/microservice-application-layer-web-api-design.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | A brief mention of the SOLID principles for designing the application layer.
- [Designing a microservice domain model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/microservice-domain-model.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Understand the key concepts when designing a DDD-oriented domain model.
- [Implementing a microservice domain model with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/net-core-microservice-domain-model.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Get into the implementation details of a DDD-oriented domain model.
- [Using NoSQL databases as a persistence infrastructure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/nosql-database-persistence-infrastructure.md): Understand the use of NoSql databases in general, and Azure Cosmos DB in particular, as an option to implement persistence.
- [Seedwork (reusable base classes and interfaces for your domain model)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/microservice-ddd-cqrs-patterns/seedwork-domain-model-base-classes-interfaces.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Use the seedwork concept as a starting point to start implementation for a DDD-oriented domain model.
